import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Link } from '../../interfaces/link'; @Component({ selector: 'appHeader', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit { links: Array; authLinks: Array; isAuth: boolean; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void { this.isAuth = false; this.links = [ { label: 'Acceuil', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-home-alt text-xl', visible: true, }, { label: 'Mes Cvs', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-id-card text-xl', visible: true, }, ] this.authLinks = [ { label: 'Se connecter', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-log-in-circle text-xl', visible: true, }, { label: 'S\'inscrire', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-home-alt text-xl', visible: true, }, { label: 'Se déconnecter', url: '', icon: 'bx bx-user-plus text-xl', visible: false, }, ] } }
